name: abine
long_description:
Description
===========
Abine's Cookbook. This generally needs to run
on top of a RightScale installation.

Requirements
============

Attributes
==========

Usage
=====

abine/credentials/s3_file.description: The name of the credential file as it exists in an Amazon S3 bucket.

abine/credentials/aws_access_key.display_name: Amazon Access Key that can read this file
abine/credentials/aws_access_key.description: AWS credentials that have read access to the file that you specified.

abine/credentials/aws_secret_key.display_name: Amazon Secret Access Key that can read this file
abine/credentials/aws_secret_key.description: AWS credentials that have read access to the file that you specified.

abine/credentials/credential_location.description: Local Directory where credential files should live. Leave out trailing slash

abine/credentials/s3_bucket.description: Name of S3 bucket where the credentials are stored.

recipes.abine::install_all_creds: Install a TAR of all the credentials
